Mahāsāropamasuttaṁ
Evamme sutaṁ ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate. Acirapakkante devadatte tatra kho bhagavā devadattaṁ ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi idha bhikkhave ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsehi katthaci potthake jarāmaraṇena sokehi ... upāyāsehītipi dissanti. dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto appevanāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethāti.
